pages.text: Based on the ancient vanguards, you've created a zombie variation that focuses on intimidation and brute force, rather than finesse. Wearing heavy plated armor and a spiked club, these undead horrors trade speed for strength and power.

If they're shield-less, right click on them with an Iron Ingot to give them their shield back when they're not attacking.$(br)One can call these creatures through the use of a $(l:focuses/necromancy/blackguard_focus)Blackguard Focus$(), or through a ritual which summons one without a limited lifespan.
